title: Request Personal Loan Payoff Quote
description: A customer wants to know the total amount required to pay off their personal loan today.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their personal loan account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly locates the customer's active personal loan.

tasks.description: Calculate the loan payoff amount, including principal and any accrued interest, valid for today.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates an accurate payoff quote.

tasks.description: Provide the payoff quote to the customer and explain how to make the payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the total amount due and the payment options.
